original_solution_mapping.L1: He has given out 120 tickets because 15 x 8 = <<15*8=120>>120
original_solution_mapping.L2: He has 16 days left to had out tickets because 31 - 15 = <<31-15=16>>16
original_solution_mapping.L3: He has to give out 80 more because 200 - 120 = <<200-120=80>>80
original_solution_mapping.L4: He has to give out 5 a day because 80 / 16 = <<80/16=5>>5

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2774.
    Returns: the average number of tickets Officer Hopps has to give out each day for the rest of the month.
    """
    # L1
    days_first_period = 15 # The first 15 days
    avg_tickets_first_period = 8 # averages 8 tickets a day
    tickets_given_first_period = days_first_period * avg_tickets_first_period

    # L2
    total_days_in_may = 31 # WK
    remaining_days = total_days_in_may - days_first_period

    # L3
    total_tickets_goal = 200 # give out 200 tickets in May
    tickets_remaining_to_give = total_tickets_goal - tickets_given_first_period

    # L4
    avg_tickets_per_day_remaining = tickets_remaining_to_give / remaining_days

    # FA
    answer = avg_tickets_per_day_remaining
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He has given out {tickets_given_first_period} tickets because {days_first_period} x {avg_tickets_first_period} = <<{days_first_period}*{avg_tickets_first_period}={tickets_given_first_period}>>{tickets_given_first_period}
He has {remaining_days} days left to had out tickets because {total_days_in_may} - {days_first_period} = <<{total_days_in_may}-{days_first_period}={remaining_days}>>{remaining_days}

He has to give out {tickets_remaining_to_give} more because {total_tickets_goal} - {tickets_given_first_period} = <<{total_tickets_goal}-{tickets_given_first_period}={tickets_remaining_to_give}>>{tickets_remaining_to_give}

He has to give out {avg_tickets_per_day_remaining} a day because {tickets_remaining_to_give} / {remaining_days} = <<{tickets_remaining_to_give}/{remaining_days}={avg_tickets_per_day_remaining}>>{avg_tickets_per_day_remaining}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He has 16 days left to had out tickets because 31 - 15 = <<31-15=16>>16

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: He has to give out 1280 a day because 80 / 16 = <<80/16=1280>>1280

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '*' instead.
